item.title: 【Music Videos】Fireboy DML & Ed Sheeran - Peru [AM 4K HEVC 10-bit | PCM | DD+ Dolby Atmos]
item.description:
Genre: Electronic, Pop
Style: African, Electro
Year: 2022
Video Source: Apple Music, merci SonMaxime
Audio Source: Qobuz & Tidal, thanks moi & Richard Bowen

"Peru" is a song by Nigerian singer Fireboy DML. It was released on 20 July 2021, through YBNL Nation, and distributed by Empire. "Peru" was written by Fireboy DML, Ivory Scott, & Kolten Perine and produced by Shizzi & Perine. The song was nominated at the 7th annual African Entertainment Awards USA for Song of the Year.

The chorus is a play on Fireboy's fellow Nigerian singer Peruzzi and the country of Peru. "Para" means losing control in the Nigerian pidgin language. Here, Fireboy nods to Peruzzi's chorus on "4U," his song with DJ Ecool and Davido, where he sings: "Baby I'm loosing con control."
The song took Fireboy less than an hour to put together. By letting go of his perfectionist inclinations, he could enjoy the music-making process, and his relaxed frame of mind led to the carefree lyrics. "The song is really about a young man in a foreign land, enjoying himself," the Nigerian singer told Rolling Stone, "and just coming out of his shell and having fun and living life."

After the song garnered popularity and reached number one on the UK Afrobeats Singles Chart, Fireboy reached out to Sheeran for a remix through the founder of SB.TV, Jamal Edwards. The remix was released on 23 December 2021.

The music video featuring Ed Sheeran, was released on 24 December 2021. Directed by Gabriella Kingsley, and shot in London, United Kingdom. The music video reached 1.9 million views, less than 24 hours after its release.

Release Info
The video track is downloaded from Apple Music by SonMaxime (2160p HEVC 10-bit).
The PCM track is lossless (Qobuz CD quality, 16-bit 44.1 kHz), synced with Audition.
The Atmos track is lossy and is synced by muxing (modified delay, no quality loss).
The timed lyrics are synced and edited. Enable the subtitles to see the lyrics.
